ModMetaData.name: [1.0] Project RimFactory 3.0 - Public Beta
ModMetaData.author: Spdskatr
ModMetaData.description: A mod giving you the ability to automate parts of your colony. Credits: Data disk and tape player textures by totobrother Wood crate texture by Chicken Plucker Robotic arm texture by Shotgunfrenzy Drone texture by Xen Chinese translation by Dango998
